What are the key features of launching a new blockchain on the Verus network, including simultaneous blockchain and liquidity pool launches, blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches, and the interoperable multichain network?

Launching a new blockchain on the Verus network offers several key features that enhance the functionality and scalability of the blockchain ecosystem. These features include:

**Simultaneous Blockchain and Liquidity Pool Launches:**
When launching a new blockchain on Verus, you can simultaneously launch a fully decentralized or centralized "bridge" converter liquidity pool. This bridge converter liquidity pool allows for seamless connectivity between the new blockchain and other blockchains, enabling the exchange of assets between them. The fees generated from cross-chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool are earned on the new blockchain, with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain.

**Blockchain-Based Crowdfunding Currency Launches:**
Verus enables blockchain-based crowdfunding currency launches with minimum participation or automatic refunds. You can set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in your preferred currencies on the chain. If the minimums are not met by the start time of your blockchain, all participants will automatically receive a refund of all their pre-conversions, less the network fees. The launch options also provide for maximum participation in one or more currencies, pre-launch discounts, price-neutral pre-allocations to select IDs that increase the fractional reserve ratio to issue currencies, and pre-launch discounts for early participants. Using VerusIDs, launches can also include vesting schedules in the pre-allocations.

**Interoperable Multichain Network:**
The Verus multi-currency, multi-chain network allows for the creation of an unlimited number of interoperable blockchains. Notary IDs, specified at chain definition, provide decentralized blockchain-specific bridge confirmation, enabling public blockchains available to the world for merge mining and staking. This interoperable multichain network enables unlimited scale and new use cases, allowing blockchains to interact and exchange assets seamlessly.

These features make launching a new blockchain on the Verus network a powerful way to create a scalable and interoperable blockchain ecosystem.
